name: Guacamojo
description:
Guaco was a happy little half-avocado, until his mojo (pit) was stolen! Now he must rampage through the land, using his unique spin ability to crash and bash through every obstacle to get back his mojo (pit)!

Spin, jump, and smash your way through dozens of tricky old-school platforming levels. Bop through hordes of enemies and tackle complex and sometimes ridiculous jumping and spinning challenges with all the grace of a ball in a pinball machine. Each level has unique gimmicks and mechanics, to challenge even seasoned platform players. Starring a cast of cute voxel fruits and vegetables, this game is fast, fun and occasionally hilarious!
